about.title: About Iwan Academy
about.description: Iwan Academy is ready to help you whether you want to learn holy quran, reading, memorizing or learn standard Arabic language, and Islamic studies. through online one-to-one sessions. We can work with your needs to ensure the best learning environment for you or your kids.
about.ourTutorsDes: We know that learning is easier when you have an excellent teacher. Our instructors are native Egyptian Tutors qualified and graduated from Al-Azhar Al-Sharif University and they are passionate about the courses they teach and bring this enthusiasm into their classes and students.
